text: Anuk Fernando (born 1 August 1995) is a Sri Lankan first-class cricketer. He was part of Sri Lanka's squad for the 2014 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Cricketers from Colombo Category:Kandy Crusaders cricketers Category:Matara District cricketers Category:Alumni of St. Sebastian's College, Moratuwa
title: Anuk Fernando
